level.heading: Certain representations prohibited.
level.text: Unless licensed in accordance with this subchapter, no person may use the words or terms "plumber," "licensed plumber," "journeyman plumber," "journeyman gasfitter," "master plumber," or "master gasfitter," or any combination of such words to imply that the person is authorized to perform the services of plumber or gasfitter in the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.
